blogPosts.title: Activation Function In Neural Networks
blogPosts.description: Ever wondered how predicting the future at every stage of our lives will make our lives so convenient? Because what we don’t realise is, our life is filled with patterns. Won’t it be great to analyse these already existing patterns to make our lives easier? Well, don’t worry, Data Mining has got you covered. Data mining is the exploration and analysis of large data to discover meaningful patterns and rules.
